name: Reinforced
effect: The Veteran gains +1 Structure and +1 Stress.

name: Veterancy
effect: The Veteran gains +1 Accuracy on all checks and saves for one mech skill (chosen at creation): Hull, Agility, Systems, or Engineering.

name: Limitless
effect: The Veteran can Overcharge. Instead of the standard cost, they always gain 1d6 heat.

name: Veteran Traits
effect: The Veteran gains either a General Veteran Trait or the Class Veteran Trait corresponding to their NPC class.

name: Feign Death
effect:
General Veteran Trait
The first time that the Veteran is destroyed each combat, they are actually feigning death - they appear to be destroyed, but have 1 HP. Characters adjacent to the Veteran can reveal this with a successful Systems check or pilot skill check; otherwise, the Veteran remains unnoticed until they move or take action.

name: Lesser Sight
effect:
General Veteran Trait
The Veteran ignores Invisible for characters within Range 3, and hostile characters in Range 3 canâ€™t Hide (though they remain Hidden if they were already).

name: Lightning Reflexes
effect:
General Veteran Trait
Whenever the Veteran is attacked using any Heavy or Superheavy weapon, first roll 1d6. On 5+, the attack automatically misses. This effect does not stack with Invisible.

name: Parting Gift
effect:
General Veteran Trait
The Veteran can Self-Destruct (see Lancer p.72).

name: Self Repair
effect:
General Veteran Trait
1/scene, the Veteran regains all HP and clears all conditions that weren't caused by their own systems, etc.

name: Air Superiority
effect:
Ace Veteran Trait
1/round, when the Ace hits a hostile character with a ranged attack, that character must pass an Agility save or immediately land if flying (this counts as falling without any damage), and additionally become unable to fly until the end of their next turn.

name: Mobile Emitter
effect:
Aegis Veteran Trait
The Aegis is Slowed while Defense Net is active instead of Immobilized.

name: Rock and Roll
effect:
Archer Veteran Trait
If the Archer chooses not to move during their turn, Suppress can be used against two targets instead of one and Moving Target may be used 2/round. Each target triggers and resolves Moving Target separately, and a target damaging the Archer only ends the effect of Suppress on that target.

name: Commando
effect:
Assault Veteran Trait
The Assault may move 2 spaces before or after attacking with the Combat Knife. This movement ignores engagement and doesn't provoke reactions. The Combat Knife gains Thrown 5, and when thrown automatically returns to the Assault at the end of their turn.

name: Whirling Death
effect:
Assassin Veteran Trait
Whenever the Assassin reduces a hostile mech to 0 HP (causing structure damage or destroying them), they may immediately choose a new target for Assassin's Mark.

name: Remote Assemblers
effect:
Barricade Veteran Trait
When the Barricade uses Mobile Printer, it can print cubes out to Range 10.

name: Close Protection
effect:
Bastion Veteran Trait
Characters being protected by Friendly Interdiction may use the Bastion's Armor instead of their own whenever they take damage.

name: Rending Cleave
effect:
Berserker Veteran Trait
On hit with the Chain Axe, the Berserker deals 2/3/4 kinetic damage to a different character adjacent to either the target or the Berserker.

name: Danger Close
effect:
Bombard Veteran Trait
When the Bombard makes an attack with the Bombard Cannon, they may exclude one character of their choice in the area from the attack.

name: Leadwall
effect:
Breacher Veteran Trait
Whenever the Breacher misses all attacks with the Dual Shotguns, it may make one additional attack for free.

name: Crashing Charge
effect:
Cataphract Veteran Trait
The Cataphract may push characters affected by Trample 1 space in any direction.

name: Heavy Tread
effect:
Demolisher Veteran Trait
All other characters treat a Burst 3 area around the Demolisher as difficult terrain.

name: Turret Nest
effect:
Engineer Veteran Trait
All Deployable Turrets within Range 3 of the Engineer gain soft cover. While the Engineer is within Range 3 of four or more turrets, they also gain soft cover.

name: Oppresive Force
effect:
Goliath Veteran Trait
When the Goliath uses Crush Targeting, they may affect every hostile character within Sensors. If they do, affected characters only take +1 Difficulty to attacks instead of +3.

name: Oppresive Force
effect:
Hive Veteran Trait
1/round, on a critical hit with the Hunter-Killer Nexus, the target must pass a Systems save or become Shredded until the end of their next turn.

name: Acrobat
effect:
Hornet Veteran Trait
Any time an attack misses the Hornet, they may move up to 2 spaces in any direction as a reaction.

name: Spec Ops
effect:
Operator Veteran Trait
The Operator is equipped with an NHP co-pilot and gains the AI tag. Their mech is autonomous and can even function without a pilot. This NHP ignores cascade and grants the Operator Immunity to Impaired. The Operator's pilot can also Dismount. While on foot, the pilot uses the Human class and can take all actions available to PC pilots, including Jockey. When the Operator is destroyed, the pilot can immediately Eject before Self-Erasure (bringing the NHP with them).

name: Power Rerouting
effect:
Priest Veteran Trait
Characters linked to the Priest with Investiture can Overcharge. Instead of the usual cost, the Priest takes 1d6 heat.

name: White Hot
effect:
Pyro Veteran Trait
The Flamethrower does +2 heat on hit.

name: Concussion Warheads
effect:
Rainmaker Veteran Trait
1/round, when the Rainmaker consumes Lock On as part of a successful attack with the Missile Pods, they may knock the target Prone.

name: Angled Deflection
effect:
Ronin Veteran Trait
When the Ronin uses Rebound, on a roll of 4+ they may choose to have the attacker repeat the attack against themselves or against another hostile character within Range 3 of the attacker.

name: Thermal Dissipation
effect:
Scourer Veteran Trait
Whenever Cooling Module activates, the Scourer creates a Burst 2 area of soft cover around themselves that lasts until the start of their next turn.

name: Tactical Reposition
effect:
Scout Veteran Trait
When the Scout uses Cloaking Field, up to two allied characters within the affected area may immediately move their Speed to any other free spaces within the affected area. This movement ignores engagement and does not provoke reactions.

name: Mag Mines
effect:
Seeder Veteran Trait
Whenever one of the Seeder's mines is detonated by a hostile character, they may move all of their other deployed mines up to 2 spaces towards the hostile character nearest to them; if two or more hostile characters are equally close to a mine, the Seeder chooses one. All mines must end this movement in free spaces.

name: Eye of the Storm
effect:
Sentinel Veteran Trait
When Eye of Midnight is active, the Sentinel may attack with both the Combat Shotgun and Retractable Sword each time it takes the Overwatch reaction.

name: Blinding Laser
effect:
Sniper Veteran Trait
Whenever a character gains the Sniper's Mark, they must pass a Systems save or become Impaired and Slowed until the end of their next turn.

name: Silent Stalker
effect:
Specter Veteran Trait
The Specter can become Hidden while Engaged, and while Hidden can move through (but not stop in) spaces occupied by hostile characters.

name: Whitewash Coordinator
effect:
Support Veteran Trait
When the Support uses Sealant Gun on an allied character, it does not cause them to become Slowed. When used on a hostile character, the target is also knocked Prone if they fail the Agility save.

name: Enfeeble
effect:
Witch Veteran Trait
When the Witch uses the Invade Quick Tech action, on hit the target is also Slowed until the end of their next turn.
